snippet: At City Winery in New York City, June celebrated the release of her album “Pushin’ Against a Stone,” announcing it was time “do the dadgum song already!”
abstract: At City Winery in New York City, June celebrated the release of her album “Pushin’ Against a Stone,” announcing it was time “do the dadgum song already!”

headline.main: Valerie June Follows the Mississippi from Memphis to Manhattan
